subject: Personal Finance
title: Surge Pricing
description: Learn Surge Pricing in one minute.

hook.text: It's New Year's Eve and your Uber costs 4x normal. Surge pricing is supply and demand in real time.

buildup.text: When demand spikes, surge pricing raises fares to attract more drivers and ration limited supply.

discovery.text: Without surge pricing, you'd simply wait longer. The higher price is buying you a shorter wait.

twist.text: People hate surge pricing emotionally even when it works economically. Fairness and efficiency collide.

climax.text: Airlines, hotels, and event venues have used dynamic pricing for decades. Uber just made it visible.

quiz.question: What is the purpose of surge pricing?
options: To balance supply and demand in real time
